rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Vastu-aligned entrance facing the main road for auspicious entry; includes a small foyer with natural light.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living space adjacent to the entrance hall, featuring Mediterranean tiles and warm color palette; ideal for family gatherings.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Separate dining area within the living space, equipped with Vastu-compliant table placement for prosperity.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Spacious kitchen with modern appliances and Vastu-aligned layout ensuring proper energy flow.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Small utility room for washing and storage; strategically placed near the kitchen as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with north-eastern window placement for optimal energy; features en-suite bathroom and closet space.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Guest bedroom designed for privacy and comfort; includes a small sitting area.

rooms.name: Family Room
rooms.description: Shared family room that serves as a workspace and entertainment area; includes seating arrangement for joint family.
features: Central location in the floor plan

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Large, inviting entrance door positioned as per Vastu for positive energy flow.

openings.name: Windows
openings.description: Strategically placed windows across rooms to ensure balanced natural light and ventilation.

openings.name: Garage Entrance
openings.description: Entrance to the two-car garage ensuring smooth traffic flow and Vastu compliance.

openings.name: Balcony Door
openings.description: Provides access from the living room to the private garden; enhances natural ventilation.

garage.description: Two-car garage designed to complement the Mediterranean style bungalow; includes provisions for a private gym in an adjoining area.

private_gym.description: Dedicated private gym space equipped with Vastu-aligned layout and natural ventilation.

garden.description: Expansive garden area surrounding the bungalow; designed to provide a serene outdoor environment for family gatherings.

rooms.name: Second Living Area
rooms.description: Additional living space on the upper floor for joint family gatherings; features ample natural light and Mediterranean decor.

rooms.name: Private Gym (Upper Level Access)
rooms.description: Alternate access to the private gym for convenience and privacy; Vastu compliant with north-eastern light.

openings.name: Staircase
openings.description: Well-designed internal staircase ensuring smooth transition between floors; positioned in accordance with Vastu guidelines.

openings.name: Window Openings
openings.description: Strategically placed windows for optimal light and ventilation on the upper floor.
